title: Three Little Pigs: The Wolf's Story
description: This retelling of the The Three Little Pigs is told from the wolf's point of view. Readers will sympathize with the homeless, freezing wolf as he suffers a cold and can't stop sneezing. Illustrations support the text.
meta: delirious, desperate, frostbitten, inherited, modern, ordeal, quaint, sapped, sturdy, unconscious, vegetarian
Compare and Contrast : Compare and contrast this retelling with the classic story
Blends : Identify initial and final consonant st-blends
Alphabetical Order : Place words in alphabetical order
